Description:
Key AccountabilitiesWork independently and with the team to understand project requirements, existing implementations and build or maintain the technical aspects of ECM applications including but not restricted to analysis, design, estimation, optimization and development of business requirements.
Analyze, Design, Estimate and develop solutions using ECM application’s scanning, content, integration, process functionalities
Work closely with business and techno functional analysts to understand the business requirements
Perform initial design reviews and recommend improvements
Write clear codes and prepare coding documentations
Assist in timely L2/L3 troubleshooting of ECM Applications
Experience working in a structured waterfall development process
Participate in the set-up and deployments in all environments including production.
Conduct code reviews, testing and work closely with QA team (where applicable) for SIT and with business for UAT
Contribute to the overall enterprise architecture
Support the training of new team members on existing business processes and required tools
Document all requirements functionally and technicallySkills
Skills: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent
